projectOverview.title: Logging and Monitoring Service for AI-Powered Text Adventure Engine
projectOverview.description: A service that tracks and logs interactions and system performance, providing insights for diagnostics and optimization.
goals: Aggregate logs from different services for centralized analysis
Monitor performance metrics and system health
Provide interfaces for retrieving logs and metrics

functional: Collect logs from all integrated services
Store logs in a centralized repository
Provide an endpoint to retrieve logs for analysis
Monitor key performance metrics such as response times and error rates
Alert administrators of critical issues or performance degradation
nonFunctional: Ensure minimal impact on system performance

serviceName.description: Name of the service that generated the log

timestamp.description: Time of the metric data point

value.description: Value of the metric at the given time

constraints: Logs and metrics must be stored securely and access-controlled
The service should not introduce significant latency or overhead

glossary.Log: A record of events or messages generated by a service
glossary.Metric: A quantifiable measure used to track performance or health

changeLog.changes: Initial specification for Logging and Monitoring Service
